data.name: DATA_BREAK
data.detailed_description:
Data_Break is a darkly humorous RPG inspired by games like Earthbound, Undertale and LISA: The Painful. You play as an office drone who lives a seemingly ordinary life, but something isn't right... A mysterious stranger will soon set into motion a series of events that gradually reveal the horrifying truth...

Features


  • Experience a mundane existence in game, as well as in real life!
  • Get showered, go to work, eat, sleep!
  • A PLAYABLE TOILET!
  • Beat or befriend foes like spiders, the elderly, teens, someone that definitely isn't Mickey Mouse, your boss, and more.
  • Lots of choices, and some that will bite you in the *** later!
  • Care for your cat. Or not because you are heartless POS.
  • An awesome original and authentic 8-bit soundtrack
  • Lots of jokes, references and Easter eggs
  • Multiple endings
  • Learn the meaning of life*
*you might not learn the meaning of life.

data.short_description: A darkly humorous RPG inspired by games like Earthbound, Undertale and LISA: The Painful.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft速 Windows速 7 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft速 Windows速 8/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
